item.title: Cargo Restraint Systems – COMPARTMENT REMAINS EMPTY

remarks.para: May be inoperative or missing provided associated cargo compartment remains empty.

numlitem.para: Associated cargo compartment is empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment.

placard.para: Placard below captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "______ CARGO COMPARTMENT(s) ARE EMPTY". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
